software.description: ALVIN - Automatic Lateral Ventricle delIneatioN is a fully automated algorithm which works within SPM8 to segment the lateral ventricles from structural MRI images. The algorithm has been validated in infants, adults and patients with Alzheimer's disease (ICC>0.95). ALVIN is insensitive to different scanner sequences (ICC>0.99, 8 different sequences 1.5T and 3T) and sensitive to changes in ventricular volume. Processing time is approx 10mins per subject. Download from here or visit our main website http://sites.google.com/site/mrilateralv...
